Kunstemporary Records

I'm an urbanist, researcher, and designer living in Brighton, Massachusetts.

I work on issues of alternative economic development, labor landscapes, the politics of space, and making cities fun.

Currently an Urban Planning student at the Harvard Graduate School of Design.

(Slowly) moving items from my old portfolio over to this site.
